Class Gate

  • java.lang.Object
    • Gate
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AndGate, FlipFlop, Input, Inverter, OrGate, Output

    public class Gate
extends java.lang.Object
    The super class for and, not, or gates , flip flops, inputs and outputs
    Author:
    A.Aly
